main event: Red or orange objects were observed moving from SW to NW at about 300-600 feet before fading into darkness.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 45 minutes., The objects were reported to be red or orange., The husband of a civilian observer saw the objects coming over the horizon., The report suggests the objects may have been a star, planet, or balloon., Weather conditions were clear with scattered to broken skies at the time of sighting.
